[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00001111 is converted into SFP   01000010_11100000_00000000
    FLOAT 11000000_00010000_00000000_00000000 is converted into SFP   11000000_00100000_00000000
    SFP   01000010_11100000_00000000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00001111
    SFP   11000000_00100000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 11000000_00010000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    01000010_11100000_00000000 + 11000000_00100000_00000000 = 01000010_10011000_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    01000010_11100000_00000000 * 11000000_00100000_00000000 = 11000100_00001110_00000000
